name: MobileEdgeApplicationService
description: MEC Mobile Edge Application Service resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: address
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The IP address where mobile edge services can be accessed

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: It indicates the operational state of the object instance

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: transportsSupported
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates transports and serialization formats supported made available to the service-consuming application
